QuestData.Title: Southern Sabotage
QuestData.Description: The three towers south of the Wintergrasp river are draining power from the Fortress! $B$BDestroy Shadowsight Tower, Flamewatch Tower or Winter's Edge Tower, then return to me. Remember, only siege vehicles can damage a tower, so make sure to protect them from the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy Shadowsight Tower, Flamewatch Tower or Winter's Edge Tower and return to Tactical Officer Ahbramis in Wintergrasp.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you bring word from the south?
QuestData.RewardText: I heard the explosion from here! Excellent job - we've already begun rerouting the power into the Titan relic to super-charge our own forces.

Objectives.Objective: Destroy one of the three southern towers
